name: Mummy: Egyptian Puzzle

Help the Mummy collect all the keys of life (Ankh). Find the way to the Underworld.

Mummy: Egyptian Puzzle is a puzzle game for the NES. The game was created using Retro Puzzle Maker.

The game contains 40 levels of varying difficulty.

name: Cube Railway
description: Cube Railway is a puzzle game where players must strategically fit blocks to complete a railway track and set the train in motion. Reach the next level by correctly placing the cubes within the designated spots on the track.

name: Young Detectives: Animals
description: Dive into a world of colorful discovery with the ultimate spot the difference game designed for young minds! Your mission is to identify the subtle distinctions between seemingly identical scenes.

name: Train Simulator: Wessex Main Line - Southampton - Salisbury Extension
description: Explore the Wessex Main Line today with the Southampton - Salisbury Extension from Just Trains.

name: Elder Legacy
description: Elder Legacy - This is a role-playing game. Embark on a soulful journey inspired by Boreyian myths and legends, filled with vibrant and unforgettable experiences. uncover the mystery behind the attempt to conquer the noble Boreyian people.

name: BathDad
description: Help Dad Relax and Enjoy His Bath Time in This Fast-Paced Score Chasing.

name: Paradise Up Above: Gold Label Edition
description: Paradise Up Above: Gold Label Edition comes with 18 total maps tak﻿ing place in beautiful tropical locales, majestic skybound islands, Heavenly hot-spots, and the sinister shadow of Hell that eternally follows Doomguy wherever he goes, even in his journey for a peaceful place to rest his weary hands.

name: MushroomJump
description: This is a casual parkour game where you are a mushroom. Control it to continuously jump upwards to reach the finish line without saving points, so be careful not to fall or fall.

name: Gorble
description: Gorble is a short marble-based dungeon crawl.

name: EmyLiveShow: Dangers & Mysteries Tale
description: Embark on a fantasy RPG with four hot VTubers in the new game EmyLiveShow!

name: Outbreak: Cold Comfort Collection
description: The countryside is burning as zombies, dinosaurs, and ghouls hunt the remains of humanity.

name: Serve & Protect Bundle
description:
"This bundle includes:

Agent Walker: Secret Journey - Find the Spear of Destiny to save the world!

Ghost Files: The Face of Guilt - Lead a police investigation in the afterlife!"

name: Co-Op Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Path of Exile: Settlers of Kalguur
description:
In Path of Exile: Settlers of Kalguur, help Kalguuran pioneers to build the town of Kingsmarch and establish trade between Wraeclast and their homeland.

The July expansion introduces the Settlers of Kalguur challenge league, a new trade market system for currency, balance improvements including two Ascendancy Class changes, Endgame improvements, some further additions to the Campaign and some Quality of Life features.

name: Aurye Clicker
description: You must collect Auryes! Use all the power at your disposal! Keys, taps, buttons, anything, and then create as many dice as possible, inflict colossal damage, and capture increasingly epic elemental creatures in this universe filled with magic, grimoires, and madness!

name: Multi-Path
description: Connect the dots to find the path. Move the dots to draw a curve that passes all the gates. You will always find a path to a goal. All it takes is a little imagination. Just relax and play. Let's start your journey to lead the light.

name: Summer Sex Saga
description: Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of summer vacation with Summer Sex Saga! Head to sunny beaches, enjoy the sea breeze, and dive into unforgettable adventures.

name: Artifact Seeker: Resurrection
description: Artifact Seeker: Resurrection is a 3D Roguelike Survivor RPG game. Aurorium continent is just a board of gods game. You can obtain artifacts by slaying enemies. How to use the power of artifacts, to play the game of gods? To end the game ? Or just be a god yourself. Artifact Seeker, Your choice.

name: Kyvedy Guardiah
description: Kyvedy Guardiah is a challenging story rich action jprg, where you have only 7 days to save humanity. Explore an ancient tower, battle in a world in turmoil, fight dark enemies and save your friends. With ever changing mechanics and a deep story that unfolds each passing day. Can you Save Humanity ?

name: Profanity Police
description: 90s inspired 2D platformer with robots that cuss at you if you jump on their face.

name: Commando Collection
description: This is a collection of 2D horizontal action shooters. Players take on the role of Allied soldiers, traveling through the major battlefields of World War II, using a variety of advanced and even exaggerated weapons, sweeping through enemy positions and defeating powerful enemy bosses.

name: Brucie's Arcade
description: A retro arcade game bundle where you must manage a restaurant through four mini-games: Ingredient Run, Cooking, Serving, and Stacking Leftovers. Each game offers unique challenges packaged up in a familiar, replayable arcade format.

name: Abnormal 1999: Sector 49
description: Abnormal1999: Sector 49 is a challenging mystery puzzle game. You play as Sam, searching for your daughter in the abandoned Sector 49. Collect 10 consciousnesses to open the portal and escape.

name: The Better Deal
description: A visual novel with a captivating story, ultrarealistic images, top-quality animations, and multiple love interests. Dramatic, emotional journey filled with adult content and meaningful player choices that shape unique endings. Both male and female romances await. Dive in and start your adventure!

name: Mission Andromeda
description: Escape from Earth! Navigate procedurally generated levels using your trusty Jetpack and Laser rifle, gather precious Ores to trade and Biomass to fuel your ship "Mole-1" on it's way to the final destination, Andromeda!

name: The Duck Pond
description: The Duck Pond is a condensed and relaxing idle game, focused on creating a short handcrafted experience with an ending. Throw food to attract different types of duck, read about them in the duckopedia, and maybe you'll discover the epic giga duck!

name: Find the Stalker
description: Find the Stalker - a psychological thriller, that is set in a rural village. As our heroine, deal with your dark past, before it deals with YOU.

name: Rock the Islands
description: Team up with friends and dive into adventure! Rescue dwellers, let them work for you so they farm resources and protect you from enemies. Upgrade your equipment, explore new lands, complete quests and fight evil with glory!

name: Ruzar: The Dark Stones
description: Embark on a perilous journey in Ruzar - The Dark Stones, the sequel to Ruzar - The Life Stone. Explore mysterious realms and uncover the secrets of the Dark Stones, with enhanced gameplay testing your skills in treacherous dungeons.

name: Path of Hero. Story of Dartes
description: This fun jRPG will immerse you in a fantasy world. The game makes fun of the clichés of old jRPGs, essentially being a funny parody of the games of our childhood. Immerse yourself in complete absurd satire. Learn professions, hire mercenaries and perform feats as if you were a Hero (Probably).

name: Mycelium
description: Enter the post-extinction world of Mycelium. With humans extinct, take control of a new, sentient species of fungi-Spores. Grow your Spore community, grant them powerful abilities, and battle against evolved insects in this Action Roguelite, Pet-Simulator game!

name: Starcremental
description: Idle Incremental game. Take Actions to complete Missions until your Morale falls so low that you experience a Mutiny. Re-spec and restart using the bonuses to Action Speed and Morale you have gained.

name: Umichan Sentoryu
description: In Umichan Sentoryu, you will experience the thrill of running a brothel cafe as Carl, a struggling businessman on hard times. This anime adult visual novel game offers a comedic and lighthearted story with tons of sexual situations!

name: Ells Tales: Chicken
description: Welcome to the survival horror sokoban! Make your way through the maze of puzzles and try to save the chicken's life.

name: Director Simulator
description: You, who lack talent, always have strange dreams. Until one day, all kinds of beautiful women from dreams entered your life one by one. You will experience an unprecedented legendary journey from a first person perspective.

name: FingFing
description: Try to solve various puzzles with cute characters by tapping with your hands

name: Beauty Riddle
description: "Beauty Riddle" is a fun click puzzle game, each game level contains a number of word riddles, the answer to each riddle is hidden in the image of the beautiful girl, come and see how many riddles you can solve!

name: ReEarth
description: ReEarth is an exciting real-time strategy (RTS) indie game. Here, you will play as humanity's last hope. By continuously building your base, dispatching various types of units, you will fend off the oncoming swarms. Prepare for the challenge and save the future of humanity!

name: Haunted Property
description: It is a psychological horror game and walking simulator. Explore a haunted apartment. Monsters jumping towards at your screen.

name: Hentai Breeding Simulator
description: Enter to unlock beautiful hentai girls, all fertile and ready to be bred!

name: Village Cult
description: The events take place in a Soviet forest village located far from civilization. The main character inherits a house. Soon the hero learns that the entire village is part of a cult. Those who sacrifice people and engage in cannibalism. The hero has to get out of the village. But can he?

name: Waking Nitemare
description: Waking Nitemare: A newtro FPS with modern twists. Dash, heal with melee headshots, use bullet time. Face unique bosses, find upgrades. Classic shooter action meets innovative mechanics. For retro fans and newcomers alike.

name: Prime Agents
description: A first person shooter entangled with magic.

name: Cheese Collector
description: Cheese Collector is a fun and addictive clicker game where you collect a variety of cheeses! Click to gather cheese and expand your cheesy collection. Every 150 minutes, you'll receive a unique cheese to add to your stash.

name: Exodus: Creepy Time
description: Join the battle in the dark world of the Middle Ages, shrouded in evil and magic, as brave knights, each of whom fights to save their native lands from mystical threats. "Exodus: Creepy Time" is an exciting shoot 'em up with a top view, combining elements of roguelike and arcade games.

name: Jewel Fight: Heroes of Legend
description: EMBARK ON A HEROIC QUEST IN "JEWEL FIGHT"

name: Cyber Racers: Retro Neon Punk Drift
description: Neon Lights, High Speeds: Unleash Your Inner Racer in Cyber Racers: Retro Neon Punk Drift!

name: City Takeover: Gentle Animals
description:
Show your gentle side as you conquer the city!
With this DLC you'll unlock:
- New characters: Horse, Monkey, Zebra, and Giraffe!
- 50000 coins to buy characters and activate abilities!
- 1000 gems to buy power-ups and boss characters
- 25 freeze power-ups for stopping your opponents
- 25 rage power-ups to speed up your army

Outsmart your enemies with skill and strategy!

name: City Takeover: Fierce Animals
description:
Show your fierce side as you defeat your enemies!
With this DLC you'll unlock:
- Powerful new characters: Xmas Bear, Eagle, Tiger, and Shark!
- 50000 coins to buy characters and activate abilities
- 1000 gems to buy power-ups and boss characters

Take over the city with strength and power!

name: Fit My Dog
description: Help your doggy friends relax after playing and find a perfect nap spot!

name: City Takeover
description: Create the biggest army of animals and defeat your opponents!

name: Faster Than Bolt
description: Will you manage to be the fastest in the world?

name: Yorisoi Delivery
description: "Yorisoi Delivery" is an adventure game for lonely nights. It's a game where you call for a "just being there delivery" and spend a late night together. As people gradually gather, the house turns into a hangout spot, allowing you to enjoy a lively and fun night.

name: Three Kingdoms Heroes
description: Multiple innovative gameplay modes, one click lossless gameplay, effortlessly building the strongest legion alliance, transforming into guild elites, and competing with the heroes!

name: Hellpit 3D Platformer
description: Unique Traps, Endless Challenges – Survive in the HELLPIT!

name: Sportitions ’24
description: Sportitions’24 is a game with cool graphics to entertain the whole family and friends, encouraging self-improvement and competitiveness in fun athletic events.

name: Maze of Portals
description: Sin descripción

name: Old Coin Pusher Friends 3
description: In this installment, there is a Sugoroku themed around the old Japan, with various events triggered by the squares you land on. Work together with other players to defeat yokai, and aim for the jackpot. As you progress in the game, you can enhance your abilities with various upgrades.

name: Emiko's Pledge 4
description: Emiko's Pledge 4 is a 2D platform action game based on the story of a half-demon girl called Emiko, who wants to become the best warrior of the Ettaze state and abroad, as well as protect the weak.

name: Hidden Cat Memories
description: Explore a surreal hand-drawn world in Hidden Cat Memories. Find cat souls and help them remember their favorite moments with their humans. Each discovery transforms the cat and reveals her touching memory. Immerse yourself in this unique hidden object adventure.

name: Frostflame
description: Frostflame is a Brazilian Soulslike developed by a single person. In the game you control Chihiro, disciples of the great master Hori Masashi on a mission to advance to the lowlands and bring back peace, ending the war of the five kingdoms and eliminating the power of the Frstlame.

name: Ribbit Rampage
description: An arcade-style top-down shooter where your only weapon is your froggy tongue. Eat hoardes of enemy insects in frantic, high-precision fights that demand clever decision-making. Don't get surrounded - it's one hit and you're croaked.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Random Animals 4
description: Puzzles of Random Animals!

name: Goblin Auto Club Manager
description: Imagine building fantastic cars out of scrap metal and letting idiots drive them. Goblin Auto Club Manager is a wacky racing management simulation. Buy parts from the junkyard, build cars with them and choose your racing strategy. Your crazy goblins do the driving. Keep fingers crossed...

name: Red Rampant
description: Red Rampant is a narrative-driven action-adventure game set in Medieval Scotland. With the ability to travel back in time through their memories of previous gameplay and begin again, players use knowledge gained from past mistakes and hindsight of future events to change the course of history.

name: Click On Lanterns Together
description: Can you and your friends find all 100+ lanterns in this panoramic level? Difficulty: Easy

name: I Commissioned Some Butterflies 3
description: I paid artists to hide butterflies and flowers in 15 artworks. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: Idylls of the Lunar Maria
description: Idylls of the Lunar Maria is a charming "match-3 builder" roguelite adventure. Chat with rats, defeat demons.

name: S. Prysm Destroyer
description: A 2D platform shooter where you DESTROY!! Get Elemental Powers from the Prysms and help Amor defeat the Primordial Threats agains Humanity! Get cute costumes and be stylish!

name: Criminal Attraction
description: You are a cunning FBI agent. Four beautiful girls are robbing banks. Infiltrate their gang and let yourself be carried away by your feelings towards them. Love? Hate? Passion? Lust? Find the evidence to frame them and send them to jail, or, fall in love with them!

name: Destroy Blocks
description: Control the spear and throw it, break all the blocks in the level to win, score points, complete the level, earn coins and go to the next level.

name: Flint's Hints
description: Flint's Hints is an escape-room-like puzzle game where you investigate your surroundings to appease your fussy pet cat, Flint. Search for hints to figure out what he wants and how to give it to him, but be careful with what you investigate. Some things are meant to be left alone and forgotten...

name: Strike Team Delta
description: Strike Team Delta is a gripping first-person shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world. Battle hordes of undead, team up with friends, and reclaim our world. Survival is in your hands.

name: CBO TD
description: CBO TD is a build your own maze tower defense. Protect your castle from hordes of mobs with different classes of towers.

name: Ultimate Shifumi Championship
description: Welcome to the biggest rock paper scissor tournament of the world! In this roguelike deckbuilder, you don't follow the rules, but mentally destroy your opponent to make them give up! In a crazy atmosphere and offbeat humor, live the experience of Ultimate Shifumi Championship.

name: Bitmap Bureau Collection
description:
Three retro classics by Bitmap Bureau, for one incredible collection of arcade mayhem.

Run and gun your way through thousands of adversaries in Xeno Crisis, searching for survivors, and ultimately facing the origin of the outpost’s demise.

Hack ‘N’ Slash your way through Battle Axe, with true to form gameplay mechanics and the fantastical pixel art world of Mercia to discover.

Beat ‘em up in Final Vendetta with nostalgic arcade graphics and a tough cast of core characters to fight with.

name: The Emperor and State
description: This is a turn-based strategy game that simulates the rule of an ancient feudal monarch. It involves the administration, policy adjustment, diplomatic checks and balances, national wars, as well as the emperor's self-cultivation, the cultivation of successors and so on.

name: Slavs vs. Lizards
description: This is a role-playing game with RPG-survival elements, based on an alternative history of ancient Slavs. You'll also find numerous references and plots based on Slavic mythology and fairy tales. Explore the open game world on your own or with friends.

name: Catacombs
description: Roam around the catacombs, collect everything and avoid being found at all cost. It will see you. It will chase you.

name: Wéko The Mask Gatherer
description: Discover a vast world of mystery, filled with fearsome enemies, extraordinary tales and unforgettable scenery. Find and collect powerful masks to help an unlikely hero fight back the darkness.

name: Mandela Syndrome
description: A horror puzzle game about keeping the world from being forgotten, one box at a time. Control multiple switchboards, solve puzzle minigames and survive the horrors of this strange Association.

name: Dough: A Crime Strategy RPG
description: Money, power, women, status... in the Prohibition, the world of crime is prospering. A Strategy RPG game where you start from the bottom and try to conquer the whole city, it would've been so easy too if you didn't have to fight pesky policemen, greedy politicians and ruthless competition.

name: DefenseCraft
description: DefenseCraft brings revolutionary new mechanics to the tower defense genre, combining the traditional tower defense style with exploration, crafting and more! Sent to a far-off land called Sector 4, in search of a lost group of explorers, we find that the land is not as docile as it seems.

name: Moth Planet
description: Moth Planet is a kinetic, energetic 2D platformer where you interview moths and explore an interconnected world in search of the truth!

name: Sailist
description: Upgrade your ship and expand your fleet in a thrilling adventure on the infinite seas! Take a relaxing voyage and enjoy the scenery while listening to the soothing sounds of the ocean, or diligently search for other ships to plunder. Live the life of a sailor on the free seas.

name: Dystobel
description: Seek the path to your freedom! Join to 84831 (Babel) on her journey to change the way her world is ruled. Dystobel is a metroidvania based on the change of powers with which you can dodge and nullify attacks, with multiple objects to discover and equip.

name: NeonCyber.exe
description: NeonCyber.exe is a 3D parkour platform game. Complete levels in the shortest time possible and score points to earn coins. You can use them to buy skills, upgrades and skins for your character.

name: Zoo Simulator
description: In Zoo Simulator, your main task is to run and manage your own zoo. Renew it and take care of all the animals' needs, ensuring them a peaceful life! Will you attract crowds of visitors? Create your own zoo!

name: Eden Island
description: Eden Island is a realistic-style survival game. As a survivor, you will explore and survive on a beautiful tropical island, craft weapons against beasts, farm and hunt, build your own home.

name: Frontier Hunter: Erza's Wheel of Fortune
description: After the empire invented the airship, people finally became able to fly across float continents and islands. And thanks to that, the empire expands rapidly.The top hunter, Erza, leads an exploration team to explore the savage frontier where the empire can’t reach.

name: S&box
description:
This is our attempt to create a worthy Garry's Mod sequel.
We've been playing with it for a long time. It started off on the Unreal Engine, but now it's being developed on Source 2.
It's not going to be Garry's Mod 2. My hope is that it will eclipse what is possible in Garry's Mod rather than simply be a modern version of it.
The current status is "heavy development". The aim is to give some people access in the first half of 2021, and give everyone else access in the second half of 2021.

name: Total War: Pharaoh Dynasties
description: A free addition for Total War: Pharaoh owners that vastly expands the game by adding the Aegean and Mesopotamian regions to the campaign map alongside new major factions including Troy and Babylon, new minor factions, new and reworked units, new battle mechanics and more.

name: Make Up Human
description:
Make up a person by combining body parts!

"Make Up Human" is a 3D puzzle game.
Drop human body parts such as eyes and ears into a box.

When the same parts come into contact with each other, they will change into the next level part.

Parts will age over time and will never be able to change again.
Be careful, as in rare cases they may not age and become cancerous!

If you're lucky, you might find a special part that can change any part.

If even one part falls outside the box, it's game over.

name: Earth Defense Force 6: Fencer Weapons - Proto Reflector
description: A shield that reverses movement.

name: Earth Defense Force 6: Air Raider Boarding Weapons - Eros No. 6
description: Armed helicopter with a special paint job.

name: Earth Defense Force 6: Air Raider Boarding Weapons - Naegling No. 6
description: Specially painted carrier equipped with multipurpose missiles.

name: Earth Defense Force 6: Fencer Weapons - Power Blade Zero
description: A blade for close combat. It produces a jet of light to slash the enemy.

name: Earth Defense Force 6: Ranger Boarding Weapons - Free Bike No. 6

name: Earth Defense Force 6: Strengthening Parts for Fencer - Gunner's Exoskeleton
description: Special exoskeleton tuned for gunfire.

name: Earth Defense Force 6: Ranger Piloted Weapons - Blacker No. 6
description: A combat vehicle with a special paint job.

description: A chemical explosive.

name: Earth Defense Force 6: Ranger Weapons - Aerial Reverser M0
description: A special capsule containing nanomachines. When the capsule strikes a target, it explodes and disperses nanomachines over a wide area.

name: Earth Defense Force 6: Ranger Weapons: Broken MR98 Fang
description: A high-caliber sniper rifle with a damaged scope.

name: Earth Defense Force 6: Wing Diver Independently Operated Equipment - Handy Saber Type 0
description: A device that generates a blade of energy.

name: Omega 6 The Triangle Stars
description: OMEGA 6 The Triangle Stars is an adventure game with 16-bit styling, based on the manga by former Nintendo art director, Takaya Imamura.

description: A daily guessing game, where players are presented with a graph visualization of a mystery data set and must guess what the information the data set represents.

name: Killer Klowns From Outer Space: Infernal Tank - Gutso
description: Never satiated, Gutso has been hunting and consuming humans for many many ages. Driven by this hunger, genetic evolutions have taken this Klown to new levels of Konsumption. Gutso is a special character skin for the Tank Klown Type and is only cosmetic.

Mazethingie is a maze generator / game.
Generate mazes of different sizes and solve them.

name: Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League - Season of Freeze
description: Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League – Season of Freeze launched on July 25, 2024, adding Mrs. Freeze as a playable character, a frozen Elseworld location, new missions, Infamy gear sets, and a Battle Pass with themed cosmetics. The update is available for all platforms as a free expansion.

name: Dusk City
description: A flourishing civilization had sunk into the sea. The night never dawns...... and a sense of apocalypse hangs over the world. You'll land on an island in such a world, and as you explore the town and ruins, you'll come into contact with fragments of the world's mysteries.

name: Phat Phrog Clicker
description: Join the community of Phat Phrog Clicker enthusiasts today and become the ultimate cute creature collector! Earn 28 unique Steam inventory skins, dropping every 30 minutes of gameplay. These skins can be traded or sold on the Steam Marketplace. Can you collect them all?

description: Letters is a clicker game where you click a letter to get more letters! Every 3 hours you can get 4 common letters, Every 5 hours you can get 2 uncommon letters and every 24 hours you get a rare letter.

name: Mushroom Season
description: Mushroom Season is a mushroom picking simulator! Customize your character and immerse yourself in the competitive world of mushroom picking. Explore rich forests filled with diverse mushrooms—some delicious, some deadly. Master the art of identification, tackle survival challenges, and engage in fun side quests. Drive vehicles to cover more ground and aim for the prestigious mushroom picking trophy. Ready to prove you're the best forager out there? Dive in and find out!

name: Master of Pieces Jigsaw Puzzle: Canvas of Time
description: Step into the past with Canvas of Time, where every puzzle holds a piece of the history. Enjoy 39 gorgeous puzzles.

name: Runes: Hidden Objects Puzzle Game
description: Step into the enchanting realm of Enchanted Crossroads, a fantasy town bustling with a myriad of captivating creatures and hidden artifacts to be unraveled.

name: X Run 3
description: Utilize parkour skills to avoid all obstacles and dangers, and reach the finish line as quickly as possible. With a fragile human body, defy gravity and pursuit, showcase your advanced parkour techniques, and experience the fun and excitement of the sport.

description: This DLC adds X1 compatibility for 5 personalities. You'll get to play special honeymoon events and yotogi as well as a Fishing minigame. Maids will now be compatible with the following events: 1. New Mode “Honeymoon Mode” 2. ”Honeymoon Yotogi” 3. ”NTR Honeymoon”

name: Love Letter: First Draft
description: Summer break approaches. With wishes unfulfilled, Danielle strives to find fellow students to attend Romance in Literature with her. If she can't, she may never be able to study Romance and Love at all!

name: Alter Age
description:
Embark on an unforgettable adventure with a party whose ages change!

Arga has been training daily to prove himself superior to his father, who holds the title of the strongest man in the world. During this process, he awakened the job "Soul Alter," a unique skill that changes the states of himself and his companions between adult and child. Sometimes a young man, sometimes a boy, he faces great trials with his companions.

Alter your team in turn-based battles between adult and child states to alternate between attack or support types! Utilize a wide range of formations and elements, including equipment and passive skills, to strategically navigate battles.

Explore a vast expanding world depicted in beautiful pixels, from puzzle dungeons to detour dungeons! Collect ingredients while walking around to cook meals, take on special quests limited to the child state, and fully enjoy every corner of the world of Alter Age!

name: Tekken 8: Lidia Sobieska
description: Warrior Prime Minister Lidia Sobieska joins the tournament! Lidia is not only a world-class karate champion, but also one of the political world's most passionate foodies. Osu! Lidia will show you what she can do in TEKKEN 8 for the people of Poland.

name: Flight Attendant Simulator: Onboard Tasks
description: Welcome Aboard! Fasten Your Seatbelt—It’s Going to Be a Thrilling Ride!

name: Exhausted Man and Candleman Bundle
description: Two heroes of the ordinary.

name: Dark Ascent
description: Dark Ascent is designed to be a test of skill, patience, and perseverance. Every decision counts, and you must learn from your mistakes to climb higher.

name: Monsuta
description: Vast action RPG bullet-hell where you take part in an adventure to defeat the evil Monsuta and restore peace to the world.

name: Skeleton Hell
description: Skeleton Hell is a cooperative horror game where you and your friends must work together to find your missing organs and reclaim your humanity. Using your skeletal form, you can solve puzzles and collaborate with each other to escape, while avoiding the dangers that lurk within!

name: Behind The Backrooms
description: Behind the Backrooms is a 1-4 player co-op horror exploration game

name: Necuratu
description: Vampire real-time strategy game. Players take on the role of the ancient vampire who has been looted and must find his loved one - and potentially cause havoc.

name: Project 13 Perception Test
description: Sit down in the ultimate perception test sequel! Spot and report anomalies in immersive scenes while sitting in the Observation Chair. Conquer the challenge by identifying 13 anomalies correctly in a row. Are you ready?

name: Bulletrooms
description: It's still the same yellow rooms, but now you're the hunter here instead of the victim.

name: Furry Sex Resort
description: Immerse yourself in an unforgettable journey to an exotic resort in FURRY Sex Resort , where the line between fantasy and reality blurs. In this captivating adult visual novel, you play as a bored tourist who unexpectedly discovers an upcoming beauty contest.

name: Fishing For Cats
description: If you are tired of fighting and killing, then come fishing and feed the cats. In this game, you will fish in the park and feed the fish you catch to the hungry stray cats in the park, constantly improving your intimacy with the cats and becoming good friends with them.

name: Isles of Silence
description: An Incremental Management game about hunting increasingly fearsome monsters, using their materials to grow stronger and build a colony of survivors, each with their own unique mechanics. Expand further into the Isles of Silence and uncover the mystery of the events that led to your world's calamity.

name: Chushpan Simulator 2
description: On their way from Ugryupinsk, Egor and Nastya find themselves caught in the middle of a conflict between two gangs — the Pavers and the Glaziers. Egor must find common ground with the Glaziers, deal with the Pavers, and rescue Nastya

name: Business Empire Tycoon
description: Start your new Business and grow it into an Empire and become the next Tycoon!

name: Restless Nights
description: The Shadow Stalker is out to get you, but why? Try to fall asleep while fixing anomalies around the house and keeping the fireplace lit in this horror experience as you uncover the truth of why your being haunted. How long can you survive?

name: Graphwar II
description: Graphwar II is an artillery game in which you must hit your enemies using mathematical functions. The trajectory of your shot is determined by the function you wrote, and your goal is to avoid the obstacles and your teammates and hit your enemies. The game takes place in a Cartesian Plane.

name: Colo Moon
description: This game is a highly difficult mountain climbing physics action game. All you need to do is one click and force roll.

name: Poodle Clicker
description: Free to Play Poodle Clicker is a game full of stylish Poodles and original Music, mostly melodic metal songs, but there are more!

name: Links Quartz
description: A turn-based RPG with mysterious graphics in which dot-picture characters move through 3D space. Use the “Shift” command to change the character's standing position to gain an advantage in the battle.

name: Red Nose Guy The LegenDairy Quest
description: Red Nose Guy: The LegenDairy Quest is a modern and high-energy revisit of an arcade classic.Join Red Nose Guy on an adventure through the city's various neighborhoods and discover his colorful and absurd universe!

name: Toilet
description: A casual puzzle game. Go to the toilet, one must also strategize.

name: The Legend of the Dragonflame High School 3

Spot the Difference in Horror Illustrations

description: Create crazy cars, explore Puppy Town, and experience incredible adventures! A safe and fun game for children.

description: Your Dream Farm Is Waiting

name: Gaggi Clicker
description: Welcome to Gaggi Clicker, the ultimate click-and-collect game! Immerse yourself in the world of "Gaggis" – enchanting little creatures just waiting to be collected by you.

name: Aooni

description: Explore romance as you match with alluring Sims and plan exciting dates in The Sims 4 Lovestruck Expansion Pack.

description: Shoot and slice your way through enemies with the Trepang2 Bladekisser DLC. Embark on new missions in new areas, and engage in close, brutal combat with your sword. Are you worthy enough to wield the blade?

description: Wallace & Gromit have opened a mini golf course at 62 West Wallaby Street! Filled with ingenious contraptions to delight both die-hard fans and curious newcomers, you'll be swept away on a fun-filled journey through iconic moments from the beloved films. Grab a club and get cracking!

name: Speed Overflow
description: Innovative Rogue-like game. Speed is your weapon! All you need to do is "Dash" and "Burst", to "crash" the enemies in your own style.

name: Soulkin
description: Soulkin is a tactical roguelite game blending strategic monster-collecting and turn-based combat. As the summoned heroine, Nadia, you’ll harness the power of Souls to bond with magical creatures and lead them against the encroaching corruption threatening Ankiril.

name: Sea of Thieves: Season 13
description: Sin descripción

name: Fish Idle 2
description: Catch fish idle on a hook in the fish kingdoms and become an idle fish tycoon.

name: [REC] Paroxysm
description: You're a horror content creator, venturing into frightening locations to captivate your audience. You're attempting to attract more viewers by recording paranormal events. However, these horror-filled adventures will one day come back to haunt you, at a high cost.

name: Humay
description: It is a fantastic adventure game.

name: The Last Vampire Hunter
description: As the last of a long lineage of Vampire Hunters, Beaumont Lacaster finds himself in the doorsteps of Nosferatu's Castle. By defeating him, he can rid humanity of the curse and evil of vampires. Will he be able to defeat Nosferatu?

name: BackRooms: Lost
description: Backrooms: Lost supports multiplayer, allowing 1 to 4 players to navigate mysterious environments, evading lethal entities while striving to escape. All future content updates, like new levels and game modes, will remain complimentary. The multiplayer mode will launch alongside the initial release.

name: Middle School Zombie 2
description: In this adventure game, you play as a student trapped in a cursed junior high school, trying to escape while defeating zombies. The game world, presented in realistic images, gives players an immersive experience.

name: Kingdom Rush 5: Alliance
description: While a formidable evil emerges, an unexpected alliance is taking shape! It will take the finest warriors of Linirea and the relentless Dark Army to stop it. Beware! Though they may journey side by side the ever-changing winds of fate could swiftly alter their course.

name: Cyber Internet Club Simulator
description: Take charge as the brains behind the trendiest cyber club in the city. Turn your humble beginnings into a top-tier cyber sanctuary through resource management, strategic investments, and maintaining a steady cash flow. Are you prepared to construct the cyber club you've always envisioned?

name: Disgaea 7: Koremade no Zenbu Iri Hajimemashita
description: A complete edition of Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless containing all existing downloadable content and bonus items, plus a new bonus story, new characters, and new post-game elements.

name: Project L33t
description: Dive into Project L33T, a hardcore first-person tactical extraction shooter. Confront AI foes and rival players, engage in high-stakes battles for precious loot, and risk all your gear to collect, secure, and extract Artifacts in this hostile environment.

name: Mermaid Tale
description: Kaya found a great place for her friend's concert. But the local forgotten spirits are a little angry. Set up the show together with other mermaids and calm the spirits of the oceans in this little explore game.

name: Soul of Ankiril
description:
Soulkin is a tactical roguelite game blending strategic monster-collecting and turn-based combat. As the summoned heroine, Nadia, you’ll harness the power of Souls to bond with magical creatures and lead them against the encroaching corruption threatening Ankiril.

This mystical world, anchored by a colossal tree, teems with magical creatures known as Soulkins, each infused with the power of elements. Will you rise to the challenge and become the savior of Ankiril?

name: Hannah’s day
description: Hannah's Day is an action-puzzle adventure about Hannah, who aspires to put together her own rock band. Ignore your parents' opinions, grab your skateboard and go chase your dreams!

name: Natsuzora no Monologue: Another Memory
description: Adds new CGs and scenarios.

name: Reynatis
description: Fantasy meets reality in Shibuya, Tokyo, where magic is something to be feared. In this action RPG, a young wizard seeks freedom through strength, and an officer seeks to control magic and restore order. When their paths cross, a darkness that will transform the world descends.

name: Arranger: A Role-Puzzling Adventure
description: Find your way in a world of breezy, thoughtful puzzles, along a charming journey of self-discovery.

name: Harmonis: The Hand-Made Kingdoms
description: Harmonis: The Hand-Made Kingdoms is a minimalist strategy game where you shape living kingdoms with unique tiles. Explore biomes, complete quests, and unlock new elements. Immerse yourself in a serene atmosphere as you design vibrant, living worlds bursting with your creativity.

name: Pastor's Lake: The Game
description: Pastor Lake - plunge into the atmosphere of a holiday village. Explore the world, complete quests, collect mushrooms or melt a sauna! You are free in your choice

name: Endless Immortal Journey
description: This is a casual strategic placement game. In the aerial world set in ancient China, players will play the role of a descendant of the Immortal Cultivation Sect. Travel through the barren continent, obtain various resources, build your sect, and ultimately ascend to the immortal realm.

name: Lilja and Natsuka: Painting Lies
description: "What are the colors of your heart?" The heartwarming story of Lilja, a blind painter, and Natsuka, her energetic assistant, who unravel the mysteries behind their clients' requests. An all-new visual novel presented by Frontwing."

name: Erannorth Renaissance
description: Erannorth Renaissance is a text-driven narrative RPG featuring turn-based tactical battles, where destiny is shaped by the echoes of your past. Carve your path through an enchanting Renaissance-fantasy world, where every decision molds your character and weaves your unique tale.

name: Sylvio: Black Waters
description: Stranded on an alien planet. Witness the past to discover the truth in a game of enthralling atmospheric exploration horror.

name: Lost Castle 2
description: "Lost Castle 2" is a 2D Beat'em up Rogue-Lite game. Explore abundant treasures and items to enhance yourself, master various weapons to showcase your skills, and challenge powerful monsters to demonstrate your strength. A new adventure is calling for treasure hunters!

name: Withering Flowers
description: In a world of magic, Shira embarks on a journey to find a cure for her sick girlfriend, facing her enigmatic teacher and her fiery sister. With the aid of a fearful friend and a bold rival, she seeks answers and a chance to mend their bond after breaking up.

name: Waning Moon Z
description: Waning Moon Z is a 3D action-adventure inspired by games from the early 2000s. Glide and battle your way through a dark fantasy world populated by a range of surreal characters and sinister monsters.

name: Hirocato: The Delivery Hero
description: Hirocato is a fast-paced side scroller loaded with hard-to-beat levels, great music, gorgeous pixel art and an emotional subtle story. Control Cato while running through an exciting city delivering food while discovering the hidden truths behind Cato's world downfall - Welcome to Hirocato.

name: Runeroots TD
description: A roguelike tower defense experience set in the Runeroots universe. Take on the alien invaders by upgrading your towers, unlocking unique perks, and building the perfect defense. Each run is a new challenge!

name: Total War: Pharaoh - Dynasty Edition
description: The Dynasty Edition is the ultimate Total War: PHARAOH experience. Containing four future DLC releases and the Digital Soundtrack, witness the collapse of the Bronze Age at its most dramatic.

name: The Fall of Aether Station
description: A ruthless tower defense game with a focus on replayability and synergy. Fight increasingly difficult hordes of aliens as you upgrade your ships and adapt to new battlefields. Can you buy humanity enough time to escape?

name: Abathor
description: Abathor is a 2D arcade action platformer for up to 4 players. You are the last hope in defense of Atlantis, you’ll face hordes of enemies and countless challenges. Enjoy its pixel art and epic music. A cooperative and competitive game to achieve glory or death.

name: Crash Time: Undercover
description: In Crash Time - Undercover you will experience non-stop racing action, and embark on a high-octane manhunt, with thrilling car chases and lots of explosive missions! Are you ready? Highways are waiting for you!

name: Fallout: London
description:
Fallout: London is an ambitious, trail-blazing DLC-sized mod for Fallout 4, Bethesda Game Studios’ 2015 post-apocalyptic RPG. Fallout: London stands apart from its contemporaries and offers an entirely new experience: setting a Fallout game outside of the United States. True to its moniker, Fallout: London takes place IN London. From stuffy parliamentary aristocrats to a resurrection of the Knights of the Round Table to an uncompromising cult of revolutionaries (and more!), Fallout: London embodies the history and aesthetics of London and puts an unmistakably nuclear spin on the beloved city.

Fallout: London’s development is labor-intensive and involves a plethora of eclectic cross-discipline individuals, both at amateur and industry level. The team maintains a strong sense of professionalism and devotion to the craft. Everyone on the Fallout: London team shares a deep love of videogames, and most importantly, Fallout itself. Each member of the Fallout: London team is individually recruited for their contributions and talent in the realms of game design and modding.

name: Baradroid: A Gay Visual Novel
description: A choice-driven, high-tech, gay visual novel with elements of dating-sim! Choose your baradroid, Live with him, and... Can you teach a robot the meaning of human love?

name: Tactical Bandits
description: Tactical Bandits is an extremely challenging top-down action game where the player travels on a journey to the West Coast to reach the Last Settlement, the last known human survivor camp.

name: Shikon-X Astro Defense Fortress
description: Shikon-X is a space Point & Click game where you play as Major Daaia, the best Federation pilot. During a routine operation, you receive a mysterious transmission from the attackers, which kick-starts an epic intergalactic (and funny) quest to uncover the truth about the war, and your place in it.

name: Scorchlands
description: See your civilization grow in a relaxing city builder that you’ll play at your own pace. Terraform and colonize a new planet by the means of magic. Reshape entire regions, conduct research, and create wondrous constructions!

name: Undying Symphony
description: «Undying Symphony» tells a story about challenges that Leningrad people faced during the Siege and shows us one of the most tragic episodes of Leningrad history

name: Pigromance
description:
Pigromance is a love story of a female pig born with the fate of becoming a sausage.
It contains the adventure of a female pig heading to a sausage factory to achieve love.
A sausage factory that makes delicious sausages.
Pigs with cut lines are raised inside the fence.

When the pigs gain weight, they are slaughtered and turned into sausages.
Because this is a sausage factory.
The slaughterer who manages it works to slaughter pigs.
He catches the fat pigs and cuts them into pieces in the shape of a cutting line. And cut meat is used as a sausage ingredient.
The factory where sausages are made consists of a breeding room, a smoking room, a blood plasma room, a freezer, and a packing room.

One day, the story begins with a male pig appearing on the farm.
You play the young sow and progress through the game.
Numerous challenges await inside the factory. We hope you will overcome the difficulties by using the characteristics of the sow pig.
And please fulfill the love of the young pig.

name: Exhausted Man
description: A slow-paced action game with simple control, funny physics, and exhausted life experience.

name: 7 Days to Die
description: Set in a brutally unforgiving post-apocalyptic world overrun by the undead, 7 Days to Die is an open-world game that is a unique combination of first person shooter, survival horror, tower defense, and role-playing games. It presents combat, crafting, looting, mining, exploration, and character growth, in a way that has seen a rapturous response from fans worldwide. Play the definitive zombie survival sandbox RPG that came first. Navezgane awaits!

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: Jigsaw Masterpieces 2: Additional Puzzle Pack Set Vol.6
description: Sin descripción

name: Caramel Performance
description: Caramel Performance - Game about circus, magic and personal troubles of the girl Evelyn Vozui. Where will the fate take her? Only you decide!

name: Heroes of History
description: Mobile game with city building and developing Heroes for battles.

name: Super Bumble Trials
description:
Fresh outside and hardcore inside bike trials

Super Bumble Trials is a new bike racing game in the trials genre with a fresh art style and elaborate physics, bright locations and hardcore gameplay.

This is an alternative take on the trials genre from developer Psebay: Gravity Moto Trials, in which you have to overcome a path consisting of levels, each of which is filled with a wide variety of obstacles. For example, on one level you can find giant plants and mushrooms, on another - big logs and boulders, and on the third - a huge pumpkin in the clouds.

There is nothing superfluous here, just you and the hardcore gameplay of the game, one on one!

Forward! A challenging but exciting adventure awaits you!

name: Only Climber 2
description: Only Climber is a game to reach the top, created by combining many platform elements. It has a single-player structure in the TPS genre. Feel the challenge in the world of many different themes in this game, which shows that reaching the top has never been this difficult.

name: Arena Breakout: Infinite - Season 0
description: Sin descripción

description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Havilar (if you don't already own them) Yuan-ti Glitch Havilar Skin An Epic Feat for Havilar 7 Gold Havilar Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts
