name: Mortal Kombat 1: Khaos Reigns Bundle
description:
Level-up your Mortal Kombat 1 Base Game Experience and finish the fight through Havik's Reign of Khaos.
This bundle contains the Khaos Reigns Expansion and Kombat Pack.

The Khaos Reigns Expansion includes the Khaos Reigns Story Expansion and 6 new fighters with Noob Saibot, Cyrax and Sektor available at launch while the guest fighters Ghostface (Scream Franchise), T-1000 (Terminator 2) and Conan the Barbarian will be available post=launch with a 1 week early access period.

The Kombat Pack includes the fighters Omni-Man (Invincible), Quan Chi, Peacemaker (DC’s Peacemaker), Ermac, Homelander (The Boys) and Takeda Takahashi along with the Kameo fighters Tremor, Khameleon, Janet Cage, Mavado and Ferra.
The Kombat Pack also adds the Jean-Claude Van Damme Skin for Johnny Cage.

name: Yoga Master Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Learn Hangul!!
description: Educational game teaching you fundamental spelling of Hangul.

name: Fuga: Melodies of Steel 1 & 2 - Double Pack
description: A special set of both Fuga: Melodies of Steel 1 and 2 is now available!

name: Ticket to Ride Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Sunbeam Feast
description: Sunny is a creature that loves the Sun Fruit. Embark on a charming journey in a colorful and fiery world. Don't be deceived, Sunbeam Feast is inspired by classic precision platformers with many challenges and increasing difficulty.

name: Broccoli
description: Broccoli is a clicker game, in this clicker game, you can click a Broccoli! When you click the Broccoli, you gain even more Broccoli! Every 2 and 10 hours you will get dropped a Broccoli! Every Broccoli is made by the community in the discord, come join us and lets make a great community, together!

name: The Paradixion: Christmas
description: [The Paradixion: Christmas] is a point-and-click adventure game with a mysterious atmosphere.Solve various puzzles with a unique atmosphere and find the hidden elements in the game to gather clues about the story.

name: Caribbean Pirates
description: A tactical board game about the battles of sailboats in the Caribbean Sea. Spaniards, Englishmen, pirates, privateers, corsairs and the ringing of piastres and doubloons.

name: Uprising: Kingdom Come
description: Uprising: Kingdom Come is an immersive survival strategy game set in the turbulent 1800s, where you lead a group of people from bondage to freedom and beyond. Traverse the vast and beautiful countryside of Virginia. As your group evades capture and grows into a massive formidable army.

name: Spooky Mansion
description: The mansion stands as a cursed bastion of evil. As the demonologist delves deeper into the mansion's secrets, they uncover a sinister plot that threatens not only their own soul but the very fabric of reality itself.

name: The Awakening of a Villainous Lady: A Crimson and Pure White Romance
description: Step into the role of a young woman who suddenly discovers she's the "wicked rival" in a novel. Navigate the intricate social landscape of an elite academy as you attempt to rewrite your destiny. Can you transform from a predestined antagonist into the author of your own story?

name: Goddess Connect
description: Goddess Connect is a cute anime-style idle game where you dive into a never-ending adventure to collect Heroes, defeat Devils, and become a Legend. Your actions will influence the world around you—come meet these heroes now!

name: The Memory of Mallet
description: September 2020, Shenyang, where the story begins. Originally the most beautiful youth, it has been cast a faint shadow by the epidemic. Did we make another choice at the time, and our outcome would be different?

name: Fabergegg
description: Fabergegg - the ultimate clicker game! Every 3 hours, get chests or keys with unique items. Unlock chests for rare Faberge eggs. All items have properties and rarity, and are tradable.

name: Chrono Club: Race Against Time
description: The biggest karting tournament throughout history is being held, dragging in racers from all over the timeline in order to determine one thing and one thing only: Who is the best racer of all time?

name: Blood Lust
description: Fight against your friends in this multiplayer arena combat game and choose between different characters with occult skills.

name: Scissor Girl's Weed Crisis
description: This is a game that can be played alone or in pairs. Players need to avoid the attacks of weed enemies, find opportunities to attack enemies, and eliminate all enemies.

name: Radioactive Pineapple
description: Welcome to Musa Inc.! We are a revolutionary company that wants humanity to evolve to a peak potassium state. A race against time, solve puzzles the fastest to reach the end of our testing facility and gain your freedom... from being a pineapple.

name: Evolve: Mecha Squad
description: Build mechas, form mecha teams, and command them to fight.

name: Poo Pusher
description: Play the retro console classic as reviewed in "George's Gaming Grimoire". Experience the arcade thrills of shoving other people's dung around on conveyor belts, repeatedly. Quick reactions are a must to avoid a nasty mess! Will you uncover the enriching secrets of bum-based alchemy?

name: Cat Good Work
description: Cat Good Work is a simple bullet shooting Rogue game that can be operated with one hand. As the most beautiful kitten in the Cat Village, you need to recruit multiple partners and combine their unique skills and attributes to pass the most difficult trials in the village.

name: VR Kart 360
description: Strap into your VR headsets and dive into the adrenaline-pumping world of Kart 360 VR! Get ready for an unparalleled immersive kart racing experience where speed meets skill, and legends are forged in the heat of intense virtual competition.

name: Recall
description: This game plunges you into a challenging universe set against a cosmic backdrop,

name: Banana-Shaped
description: Banana-Shape is a clicker Game, in which you click on the banana shape!Win random banana shapes and grow your collection! Come hang out with us and let's become the kings of banana shapes!

name: Kiwi'n
description: Kiwi'n is a clicker Game, in which you click a Kiwi! In Kiwi you click the Kiwi to gain even more Kiwis! Come hang out with us and let's grow into something awesome !

name: Young Detectives: Holidays
description: Dive into a world of colorful discovery with the ultimate spot the difference game designed for young minds! Your mission is to identify the subtle distinctions between seemingly identical scenes.

name: Auto Empire: Dealer Car Simulator
description: Are you ready to turn rusty old cars into gold and build the car dealership empire of your dreams?

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III - Season 5
description: Be a champion in Season 5 with two brand-new Core 6v6 maps and the arrival of wrestling royalty with WWE stars Rhea Ripley, “The American Nightmare” Cody Rhodes, and Rey Mysterio. Complete the final story mission for Modern Warfare Zombies and prepare for a clean up on aisle five in Call of Duty: Warzone with the return of the Superstore in Urzikstan.

name: Apathy Satsujin Club
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Woden GP Collection
description: Buckle up, it's time to go racing!

name: Astoria: Fate's Kiss
description: Just one kiss will change the fate of Olympus forever.

name: Dungeon of Erotic Master Plus
description: This is a pseudo-3D dungeon/animation RPG. The girls hailed as the Erotic Masters after solving the mystery behind the world's toughest dungeon are now living legends. Explore the dungeons and acquire maps with these beautiful warriors and grow stronger. It's time to set off on a new adventure!

name: Down the Shaft
description: Down the Shaft is a first person horror game where you take on the duty to keep an Elder God forever contain within the cave. In order to do that, you must keep the machines that maim them active. But beware, their minions are on the loose and they won't let you do your job so easy.

name: Paranormal Place
description: Alex is a blogger who explores places with paranormal phenomena. At the request of his subscribers, he goes to an abandoned place where, according to rumors, some creepy things were noticed. What is happening there? You have to find it out.

name: Golf Bash: Online
description: Golf Bash: Online is the ultimate golf showdown where friendship takes a swing! In this silly party game, grab your clubs and prepare to battle it out throughout a round of golf.

name: Woohoo!: Game - WordSearch
description: WordSearch is the classic game of finding words in a grid of characters. Every level is random. Every level uses a random subject and picks random words for that subject. The placement of the words are random too. You won't play the same level twice. Use your mouse to select the words in the grid.

name: Woohoo!: Game - Triangles
description: Triangles is a game where you lay triangular shaped tiles next to each other on a grid. The numbers in the three corners of a tile must match the numbers of the touching tiles in that affiliated corner.

name: Woohoo!: Game - Skee Madness
description: Skee Madness is a game where you roll the ball with force down a table and then the ball flies through the air towards a group of holes. You earn points depending on which hole the ball goes through. There are 3 game modes.

name: Woohoo!: Game - Pool Frenzy
description: Pool Frenzy is a game where you shoot the white ball to hit the other balls into the pockets in the lowest amount of time. You also must not let the white ball fall into a pocket. There's 3 pool tables, 3 ball orientations and 2 ball group counts to choose from.

name: Woohoo!
description: Woohoo! is a compilation of casual puzzle and arcade games.

name: Bella Wants Blood
description: Entertain the god-like Bella’s thirst for blood in this absurd bite-sized roguelike terror defense game.

name: Silverpine Creek
description: Explore the chilling village of Silverpine Creek, trapped in fog and fear. Unravel its dark history as a reporter trapped within, facing the malevolent witch Korana. Realtime Physics gameplay, immersive VHS-style visuals, and reactive AI heighten the suspense in this harrowing tale of survival.

name: Ninja Slayer: Neo-Saitama In Flames
description: A fast-paced action platformer based on the world of Ninja Slayer, a hit manga that sold 4.44 million copies! In the fictional cyberpunk city of Neo-Saitama, take control of Ninja Slayer as he does battle with numerous evil ninjas, all to avenge the death of his wife and child.

name: Bunker Farmer
description: Bunker Farmer is a farming arcade game about defending your crops from some unwanted guests. You the player will have access to technology to Grow, Harvest and Defend your crops. When things get a bit too much or you need to research an item its time to return to your bunker for safety.

name: The Little Witch and The Lost Memories
description: The Little Witch and The Lost Memories is an exploration-based adventure game set in the dreams of a girl who has lost her memories. The game's story unfolds as she uncovers various secrets while exploring her dream world.

name: Knight's Empire
description: Play Knight the knight in a rogue-defense game, involving tower defense and rogue-like mechanics. Defend your kingdom from tons of goblins and slayers.

name: The Backrooms Regret
description: Are you prepared to survive in this hostile world? Uncover who you are and how you ended up in this dimension. But don't worry, the warm company that accompanies you will make your experience much "more pleasant". Oh, and good luck, you will need it.

name: Into the Radius 2
description: Into the Radius 2 is an immersive VR survival shooter, set in a realm of surreal landscapes and deadly anomalies known as Pechorsk Security Zone. Arm yourself with realistic weapons and team up with friends as you venture deeper into the mysteries that lie within.

name: Vector Zone
description: In Vector Zone you see yourself stuck in a world ravaged by an apocalyptic outbreak, humanity struggles to survive amidst a relentless horde of zombies.

name: Chrysolite
description:
A strange knight sat in front of a fire, darkness surrounding him. His sword stuck in the ground, covered in dried blood. He warns you against going any further, but the intrigue of what lies beyond far surpasses the instinct of self preservation.

Play as a young thief and explore the dangerous ruins of a once-prosperous kingdom. Fight against hordes of terrifying monsters, make your way through challenging platforming sections and discover the secret that lies at the very bottom of the ruins in this handcrafted experience.

Chrysolite is a narrative driven, pixel-art, 2D platformer with Soulslike inspirations.

name: Barrhell
description: Within the depths of a sinister cave, a man, cursed by an evil barrel has been transformed into a demon. To find freedom he must use his newly aquired tail to escape.

name: Midnight Ramen
description: In "Midnight Ramen", you play the role of a ramen stall owner who interacts with customers coming and listens to their troubles. However, amidst helping the customers, there seem to be some matters in your own life as well..

name: Shanshui Haven
description: Explore, Build, Prosper — Embark on a tranquil and strategically rich journey of city-building in ancient China.

name: Stolen Memories II
description: The emptiness of the chosen path entangles souls, preventing them from moving forward. The quiet, unbearably gentle withering continues, and only hope can stop it. Only hope can bring the smile to her face once more. "Stolen Memories" a non-linear visual novel with multiple endings.

name: Dreamsweeper
description:
The floor isn’t lava, it’s Minesweeper!
A Dungeon Crawler x Minesweeper Roguelike and a lo-fi musical experience like no other game before.
Navigate worlds by solving Minesweeper rooms and fight your anxieties with the power of lo-fi music. This is the story of a girl who goes to sleep listening to music every night, and awakens in a dream world to face her nightmarish anxieties.

name: Age of Goblins
description: Conquer caves, farms and towers to expand your might and raise your tribe of goblins to the heights it deserves. Age of Goblins is a real-time strategy (RTS) game with simplified mechanics where your goal is to dominate the entire map and subdue your rival tribes.

name: Midnight at the Disco
description: Annihilate massive hordes of evil alien eyeball monsters as you struggle to survive a full day on the dance floor. Choose from a diverse set of character traits, weapons and upgrades to create unique builds on each run to blast the baddies into oblivion.

name: Nights To Remember
description: Nights To Remember is a Single-/Multiplayer Horror game where you have to kill mysterious Creatures in a evacuated Area. you can find Weapons and other helpful Stuff all over the Map to be ready for the Ultimate fight

name: Tactics Greed
description: Aim for the top of the arena by using unique tactics combining units, magic, and formations! Casual action real-time strategy game that can be played with one hand!

name: Dicentra
description: You play as Basil, a young boy lost in forest of watchful trees and unfriendly guides. In a harsh storm, his only sanctuary is a seemingly abandoned mansion. He doesn't know if anyone or anything currently haunts these walls, but there is one thing he can conclude: He shouldn't have come here.

name: Cosmic Pebble
description: Jump, double jump, and throw your boomerang to navigate a mysterious, alien planet called Pebble. Fight bosses, find collectables, and uncover secrets, while enjoying an atmospheric sci-fi story about family, disability, and perseverance.

name: Kingdom of Explorers
description: Kingdom of Explorers is an adventure RPG game for up to 2 players. Each player needs to explore, collect, manage shared resources to unlock new terrains, upgrade weapons to defeat the enemies, Bosses and save the Dwarves Hidden Island!

name: Explorers
description: Explorers is an adventure RPG game for up to 2 players. Each player needs to explore, collect, manage shared resources to unlock new terrains, upgrade weapons to defeat the enemies, Bosses and save the Dwarves Hidden Kingdom!

name: Spirits of the Silicium Forest
description: You have been chosen as a sacrifice to the merciful gods. A great honor to be proud of. But why do you feel so uneasy? Create your own unique build and reveal the secrets of the Silicium Forest on a journey full of dangerous turn-based battles, mysterious encounters and fateful decisions.

name: Farlands
description: Congratulations, you've bought your own planet! An agrarian rock in the edge of the galaxy, which, for some reason, was almost given away for free. So the time has come to leave the hectic and stressful life of the overcrowded metropolis for a more rural and rewarding life.

name: Let's Minesweeper
description: It's an online Minesweeper game. You can start with any piece of minefield in the vast map. Plan your territory and purify the minefield with numerous players. Sweep at any time, and it's always there for you when you need a break.

name: Slider
description: Slider is an award-winning puzzle adventure game where the world faces cataclysm, and you must use The Artifact to solve puzzles, rearrange maps, help reconnect humanity, and, most importantly... find your cat.

name: Meiro Master
description: Now is your time to become the ultimate Meiro Master. Earn your way in to the history books and fulfill your childhood dreams of becoming the unrivalled Meiro Master.

name: Valley Peaks
description: The mountains are calling! Complete routes of varying difficulty to scale summits in this wholesome yet ribbiting first-person climbing sim. Overcome obstacles, unlock upgrades, explore a mountain paradise, and get chummy with Valley Peaks’ froggy inhabitants as you climb to your heart’s content.

name: Relentless Frontier
description: Relentless Frontier is a fast paced sci-fi FPS running on the GZDoom Engine, with a strong focus on mobility, strategy, and exploration. Beef up your Omnistruct to replicate new weapons and abilities to help you traverse the terrain and demolish threats, and escape from Ross 128-b in one piece.

name: Fractured Online
description: Fractured Online is the first open-world sandbox MMORPG mixing action combat with fully interactable environments and grind-free progression. Gather resources, craft, trade and venture into legendary travels as a solitary hero, or start a settlement with your guild and grow it into the next empire.

name: Conscript: Golden Gun Pack
description:
The Golden Gun is a gold plated Mauser C96 replica.
“A gold plated Chinese replica of a standard issue, semi-automatic German pistol. Inaccurate markings on the sights indicate this is a reproduction.”

name: F1 Manager 2024: Deluxe Upgrade Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Shikanoko Fangame
description: Shikanoko Fangame is a fanmade rhythm game based on the Shikanoko Nokonoko Koshitantan opening theme "Shikairo Days".

name: Hawk Tuah Run
description: Score points by using your special ability on microphones as you race ahead. The levels accelerate, testing your reflexes and skills. Every run is a thrilling experience.

name: Sunny Side Nightmare
description:
Eddie is a clown apprentice that dreams of becoming like his now retired idol.

However the day he thinks he's finally going to debut, the Ringmaster announced that they're closing the fun side of the circus in favor of the scary side, that just the same day, is finally presenting their new show. An open house show where the public can now participate.

Needless to say, Eddie is not happy with the sudden announcement, and has some complaints to voice.

Follow Eddie inside the nightmare that is the open house and help him take his job back... or at least escape alive.

name: Silk: A Leo Parker Adventure
description: Silk is part puzzle game, part adventure, part graphic novel. Search Sir Francis’ home for clues, meet diverse characters, retrace Sir Francis’ steps and locate the ancient palace of a long dead Ming empress. Silk is by far our biggest adventure yet!

name: MultiVersus: MVP Pack 2
description:
The MultiVersus MVP Pack offers in-game content to further customize and boost your play for subscription members.

MVP Pack 2 includes a Legendary Leave me Alone Ringout and an Epic Respects Sticker Emote.

name: Super Mario Odyssey: Kaizo Mode
description: Super Mario Odyssey: Kaizo Mode is a mod for version 1.0 of Super Mario Odyssey which increases the difficulty of every moon in the game.

name: Geo-Political Simulator 5
description: The new evolution of Geopolitical Simulator series, the hyperrealistic simulator of today's world! em geopolitical simulator 5 , play as the Head of State ou CEO de uma compania and extend your influence around the globe. By playing as several countries, try to change the destiny of our planet with orchestrated actions.

name: De:Lithe Last Memories
description: "De:Lithe Last Memories" is a Rogue-like RPG game.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time - Crystal Clocks
description:
Take aim with the Dragshot, a modified slingshot with a creeping twist. Complete 11 different puzzle rooms as you manage platform switches and crystal activation sequences. Puzzles are primarily time-based, so having a good handle on aiming and being able to maintain patience is key. Estimated completion time is one hour.

Looking for an extra challenge? Scattered around the level are four optional Pieces of Hearts. Stay alert for a special hint system that will help you find them all. Although custom music was originally planned and arranged, I was not able to get it working for this release. Listen to it here: • Trailer Theme - The Legend of Zelda: ...

This mod was originally submitted as an entry for Hylian Modding’s first competition. This update adds additional puzzles, new collectibles, new rooms like an ending room, a visual overhaul, various bug fixes, and several quality of life changes.

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Invasions - Season of the Soul Eater
description: Sin descripción

name: Growth Fish
description: Easy fish action game.Eat the food, increase the fish population, make the fish bigger and survive.

name: Twizzle Puzzle: Mushrooms
description: Twizzle Puzzle: Mushrooms - is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime.

name: Dream World Adventure
description: This is a cute and casual Roguelike game. Experience a thrilling journey in the dream world! Those seemingly cute little monsters are actually murderous. Use different weapon props to eliminate groups of enemies and survive.

name: Hawk Tuah
description: Click as much as you can before the hour passes. The more you click, the more score and better item rarity you get! Join our Discord to collaborate and create unique items. Test your patience and precision in Hawk Tuah!

name: SphereCats
description: A merge puzzle game about spherical cats, with a twist. Play the classic suika experience or try new variations every day!

name: RantCPU's: ClickBait
description: Welcome to RantCPU's Realm: Click, Collect, Trade, and Treasure! Step into RantCPU's electrifying world and start your quest to build the ultimate RantCPU card set. Every click brings you closer to the legendary Gold. The more you click, the more you win! Are you ready to play?

name: Bull Looney
description: Save Cow Bella from certain fate in this 3rd person car chasing, bull fighting adventure. Will you get there in time?

name: Run Higher
description: Run Higher is an exciting running game where you run through levels, dodging falling objects and saving your best time. Use power-ups like life replenishment and power shield. Collect XP to unlock new levels and fun headgear.

name: 3D Puzzle: Flooded Grounds
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful place.

name: Matt Murphy: The Case of the Stone Guest
description: In this pixelated adventure from Sock Films, you'll have to help Matt Murphy and his faithful friend Trey to catch, look, talk and search the underworld of Naperville.

name: Realm Drifter
description: In this relaxing first-person walking sim, Realm Drifter invites you to lose yourself in these beautifully detailed hand-crafted worlds. With an original made soundtrack to accompany you and a nostalgic 2000's graphical style, indulge in these magical worlds.

name: Color Tower Defence
description: All kinds of enemies entered the battlefield! Build your defenses against hordes of enemies!

name: Neon Phonk Robots
description: A game for real phonk fans! Infectious beats, explosions, robots, neon, basses, guns, funk!!! Create your own drone army and tear your enemies to shreds! And of course, turn the volume up to full! After all, these are neon phonk

name: Elemental Dog Defense
description: A PvP Tower Defense game where you transmute and deploy elemental Dogs to devise the ultimate strategy for each battle.

name: Sports Party Motion Sensing Fitness Game
description: Embrace the fitness revolution! Workouts become fun games. Say goodbye to boring routines and hello to thrilling, sweat-filled adventures. Get fit and have fun! Join now!

name: Sunset Afterglow
description: This is a super fun casual game

name: F1 Manager 2024: Deluxe Edition
description: Lead your team to glory in F1 Manager 2024. A new Formula 1 season has arrived, and with it, the most comprehensive F1 management experience to date. Build a legacy with one of 10 official F1 constructors or create your own team for the very first time.

name: SimuLove! vol. 1
description: As a young programmer, you're developing "SimuLOVE" with the help of your new hire, Alice. Balance work and your relationship with Jess, your girlfriend. Make choices that shape relationships and uncover secret endings in this choice-driven dating simulator.

name: MultiVersus: Season 2 - Back in Time
description: In Season 2 unlock Samurai Jack through the new battlepass, and explore a new set of rifts to unlock Beetlejuice. There will also be new unlockable cosmetics, the Water Tower stage, and the return of ranked mode.

name: Conscript: Trench Raider Pack
description: Battle through the trenches with 3 additional uniforms to choose from in the Trench Raider Pack, containing: • Elite Trench Raider • Pilot • English Tommy

name: Conscript: Deluxe Edition
description: During the First World War, a lone French soldier must navigate twisted trenches, scavenge for limited supplies and solve complex puzzles - all whilst fighting for survival in the midst of mankind's most brutal and horrifying conflict. CONSCRIPT is a new take on classic survival horror.

name: Ready or Not: Home Invasion
description: Los Sueños - STATE OF EMERGENCY: Los Sueños Police Chief Galo Álvarez issues an emergency broadcast in response to the devastating impact of the record-breaking Category 5 Hurricane Antonio across Los Sueños. Home invasion occurrences widespread and met with disaster response by LSPD SWAT.

name: Shift 87
description:
Shift 87 is a first person observation horror game.
Keen investigators can find a total of 66 anomalies throughout 3 levels of handcrafted, highly atmospheric environments.

Runs are randomly generated, featuring small and subtle as well as horrifying and unmissable anomalies to provide a gameplay experience that is uniquely different and exciting each time. Players can expect a playtime of around 2-3 hours for a full playthrough.

name: SirKwitz
description: Dive into SirKwitz: a beginner-friendly edutainment game that makes learning programming easy & fun! Explore 28 puzzles across four topics to master the very core concepts behind programming and develop your problem-solving skills. Ideal for those that think coding & programming are scary words!

name: Haunted Record
description: A 20 minute story about a mysterious ghost and an even more mysterious journalist.

name: Samurai Katana Rampage: Stickman Saga
description: Unleash Your Inner Samurai: Seek Justice with the Power of the Katana!

name: Anders: The Dark Coast
description: In "Anders: The Dark Coast," dive into a sinister underworld after a fateful encounter. Unravel the mystery with Anders and friends as they confront a malevolent gang, leading to a deeply personal reckoning with the elusive leader, Jayden.

name: Daisy The Swimmer
description: Hunt fish with the iron swimmer Daisy at the beautiful beach of Parang Blue Island. And crush the vile pirates aiming for the caught fish. Daisy's companions each have their own unspeakable stories. Gain their trust and reach the hidden truths of Parang Blue Island.

name: Swing Into Zero-G
description: Fast-paced multiplayer racing game set in the vastness of space. Compete against friends or online rivals in intense races, where quick reflexes and strategic use of diverse skills determine the victor. Embrace the challenge of swinging your way to victory in this exhilarating space-themed race!

name: Feed
description: A top-down survival horror, where you must fight your way through a mysterious mansion, surviving it's crazed inhabitants.

name: MagFighter
description: Dive into the chaotic world of MagFighter! A top-down multiplayer brawler featuring 50+ spells for epic magical battles. Witness dynamic spell collisions, strategically customize your loadout, and enjoy GBA-era pixel art visuals. Unleash the magic and become the ultimate MagFighter!

name: F1 Manager 2024
description: Lead your team to glory in F1 Manager 2024. A new Formula 1 season has arrived, packed with 24 races, new cars, new Team Principals and an updated F1 Sprint race format. Start your career at one of 10 official F1 teams or create your own for the very first time.

name: Falling Mountains
description: This is a rouge-like deck-builder game, in this game, you can choose different talismans cards, and consumables to deal with different enemies. And if you feel tired, retire and turn some of your talismans into heirlooms, then the next generation can use them.

name: Flea Market Simulator '24
description: Flea Market Simulator '24 Bargain&Buy, Repair&SellTake care of antique or fake items.Adding this game to your wishlist allows me to improve my game further. If you care about my project, add it to your wishlist to improve the game together with me.

name: Tachyon Dreams Anthology
description: Time itself is breaking up, and Dodger, the dishwashing dude onboard Penrose Space Station, is the unlikely fixer. Join the chaos in this 80s-style comedy, sci-fi text-parser adventure as Dodger tackles a cosmic crisis like no other! This version includes all three episodes + new extra content!

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Ferra Kameo
description:
Ferra, the small but nimble barbarian of Outworld, returns to the Mortal Kombat Universe. Despite not having her usual partner, she wont hesitate to make you her mount.

Purchase this pack and receive Ferra as a Kameo Character to assist you in fight.

name: Trace Hunters
description: Trace Hunters is a third-person shooter where you pilot a futuristic combat vehicle. Outnumbered and alone, blast through hordes of enemies to discover precious resources and traces of lost technology. Unlock new weapons to take on even greater challenges!

name: Thought Experiment Simulator
description: Trolley Problem, Ship of Theseus, Brain in a Vat, Infinite Monkey, Sisyphus, Prisoner Paradox, Schrodinger's Cat, etc.

name: Weyrdlets
description: Weyrdlets is a relaxing desktop pet game where you can collect cute items, decorate your home and bring a virtual pet onto your desktop when you need a loving companion!

name: Linkito
description: Unleash your creativity with Linkito! Connect blocks to solve unique puzzles and create your own masterpieces. A sandbox puzzle game with endless possibilities. Join the Linkito community and share your puzzles with the world.

name: Forgotten Mines
description: Wreak vengeance and retake lost mines from goblins, orcs, skeletons, and demons in this small-scale tactical roguelite RPG. Build the perfect expedition team and turn the underworld red with each challenging, fast-paced run.

name: Elemental Raiders
description: Assemble your team of Heroes, choose from hundreds of skills, and unleash them to defeat your opponents! Elemental Raiders is a fast-paced, strategic hero battler that will challenge your tactical prowess. Join the fight & save Runaria!

name: The Star Named Eos
description: Capture photos and step back in time to experience the moments held within them in The Star Named EOS. Solve a variety of puzzles to help a young photographer uncover the truth about his mother’s disappearance and rediscover the beauty that is to be found in the world.

name: Eve of Calamity
description: Turn-based fantasy RPG freedom. Prevent a world-ending Calamity your way.

name: Tales of Fablecraft
description: Fablecraft is a cooperative digital tabletop roleplaying game set in the vibrant, hopeful world of Mythas. Our platform integrates interactive battlemaps, video, audio, and text chat, digital dice and unique game system, and a library of artwork and music, to bring your stories to life.

name: CrossOver: Roll For Initiative
description: Defend your tabletop RPG paper character sheet from invading pixel enemies! Find matches in your tray of dice to power attacks to clear the evil from your shelf full of campaign books. Hardcore match-3 RPG puzzle meets action-strategy tower defence. Far from a casual game!

name: Resurrection of mind
description: Metroidvania with an intriguing narrative about three heroes. Each hero has a unique combat system. Exciting adventures are waiting for you. The story involves a confrontation between the firstborn and humans. The appearance of a strange crystal further twists the intrigue around the events.

name: Ova Magica
description: Experience a colorful farm game inspired by the classics! Train cute blob creatures, take care of your farm and make friends with the people of Clover Town.

name: Conscript
description: During the First World War, a lone French soldier must navigate twisted trenches, scavenge for limited supplies and solve complex puzzles - all whilst fighting for survival in the midst of mankind’s most brutal and horrifying conflict. CONSCRIPT is a new take on classic survival horror.

name: Exophobia
description: Explore and fight your way through a crashed human spaceship infested with relentless hordes of aliens as you become more powerful with exciting weapon upgrades and powerups in this retro inspired first-person shooter.

name: Été
description: Fill a blank canvas with ink and photograph alongside Marianne, an ambitious young filmmaker, and Théo, a charming musician. Explore a maze of intimate moments by using memory itself to navigate an immersive, open world.

name: Rawmen
description: Rawmen is a free to play outrageous multiplayer battler that cooks up a tasty take on the arena shooter. Sling soup, fling food and battle as a beefy chef in a game where weapons are an absurd concoction created in the kitchen.

name: Nightfall Terror: Trails of the Dead
description: You play as Detective Mason, an investigator determined to solve the chilling mystery of the disappearance of three teenagers. Their last known location was in The Whispering Pines Forest. Will you find those poor kids or is it too late?

name: Kiosk
description: Take on the night shift at a small fast food kiosk, uncovering the mystery of what happened to the previous worker. Can you unravel the truth behind the strange events?

name: Euro Truck Simulator 2: Schmitz Cargobull Trailer Pack
description: Schmitz Cargobull is known for its innovative designs and high-quality trailers, making it a trusted name in the automotive industry. With eight new Schmitz Cargobull trailers and five cabin accessories, you will never miss the deadline to deliver your cargo!

name: Frozen Heart
description:
To bring death and destruction upon this dying world. Drench the land with bodies and flood the rivers with blood. Fill the void of your frozen heart with vibrant colors and infinite beauty caged inside.

It's a megawad composed of short maps, where every map has death exit. Will you find it in your heart?

name: Toree Missions
description: 24 small but tight challenges that use the traditional 3D Platformer Gameplay of Toree in unique and new ways to give a final spin to the known formula.

name: Hentai Golf: Director's Cut
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Stars: Magnificent Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Beauties Unveiled 2: Tiffany Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Exposure Office Simulator
description: Exposed Office Simulator is an office touching game. By touching the breasts and other parts of the body, the game makes you feel as if you are touching them, as you become animated by touching them.

name: Jigsort Journey: Puzzle Blend
description: Jigsort Journey: Puzzle Blend is a serene puzzle game featuring 500 unique levels with varying puzzle shapes. Enjoy relaxing gameplay and background music as you piece together puzzles. Each completed level allows you to save the beautiful picture and use it as a background on your computer.

name: Y'Ryando
description: Y‘Ryando is a Lovecraftian puzzle-solving game that showcases a layered papercraft aesthetic. In this game, players will uncover the ongoing stories of the town through a unique perspective, acquiring hundreds of clue fragments by rolling dice.

name: Splash Dino 2
description: Another meeting with a cute dino. Drag objects (wooden boxes and triangles and other objects) to help the little dino throw the wooden ball into the water. And remember that dino can help you with tips (hints), skips and dino coins. 80 levels.

name: Ashes of the Union
description: A top-down roguelike vehicular shooter set in a Soviet post-apocalypse.

name: Punch Club 2: Complete Edition
description: Train, fight, and rise to the top in Punch Club 2: Complete Edition!

name: Run Run My Bride!
description: This is a parkour game where players need to control the bride and groom in a race, dodging vehicles and obstacles along the way, while collecting plenty of hearts.

name: Before the End
description: In this game you play as an experienced paranormal investigator. On the way you will need to look for keys from the doors, notes from the staff and those who studied here.

name: Crossbow Quest
description: Whether you're a seasoned gamer looking for a new challenge or someone seeking a relaxing yet engaging experience, Cross Bow Quest promises to deliver an unforgettable adventure. Sharpen your skills, find your zen, and take on the quest of a lifetime.

name: The Simple Climb Game
description: This is a game where you climb by jumping, sprinting, and slowing, while being careful not to fall. The only thing you can do to escape from a world where one day suddenly no one is left is to climb. If you keep climbing without giving up, you will definitely be able to escape.

name: Scrambled Eggs
description: "Why did the chicken cross the road? It didn't." Try to stop the chicken hordes with vehicular combat. Compete for high scores against your friends.

name: A Dwarves Day
description: A Dwarves Day is a 2D adventure game with platformer-style gameplay. You play as a dwarf who finds himself tricked by greed into tumbling down a treacherous hole by a pesky goblin. You must delve deep in search of a way out and get back to that gold! Just a typical day in the life of a dwarf.

name: Wasted Shot
description: Wasted Shot is a open world VR game inspired by GTA. It features in game shops, pedestrians, cars, weapons, a customizable character, physics based gameplay and more.

name: Bass Defense: First Memorythms
description: In Bass Defense's rhythm-based and action-packed 'Soundwave' game mode, you must hit the correct buttons in time with the music to clear your NMYs and save your base with the help of your upgradable power-ups or your sense of rhythm. Try your luck and 5 memorythms in this free episode.

name: Highway Hijinks
description: Highway Hijinks is a roguelike endless runner that takes place in a futuristic post-apocalyptic world controlled by a mysterious artificial intelligence. Discover wacky items, race against computer opponents, and upgrade your vehicle with powerful gadgets to get as far as you can.

name: Glitch of The Game
description: A small indie rpg/puzzle game where you will need to figure out various glitches and exploits in order to defeat The Big Bad.

name: Dino Tribe: New Era
description: Create your dino chief, lead your tribe. Survive waves of enemies, explore and settle on foreign islands. Find a way to avoid extinction!

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Blazing Edition
description: The Blazing Edition of Guilty Gear: Strive includes the base game, the 4 Season Passes, the Ultimate Edition Content Kit and the Guilty Gear 25th Anniversary: Special Additional Color Pack.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Season Pass 4
description:
Season Pass 4 adds 4 characters to Guilty Gear: Strive with the returning characters Queen Dizzy and Venom, the new character Unika from the anime Guilty Gear Strive: Dual Rulers and the guest character Lucy from the anime Cyberpunk: Edgerunners.
It also includes 2 new stages, the Season Pass 4 Premium Color pack with color #16 for all characters except Lucy and the Season 4 Characters Additional Colors pack for the 3 new Guilty Gear characters.

name: Locally Sourced Anthology I: A Space Atlas
description: Locally Sourced Anthology I: A Space Atlas is a collection of 8 experimental games, each developed by a different indie team, with each game focusing on a different

name: Soul Park
description: Build an infernal fun park, judge your customers' sins and give them what they deserve: a HELL of an entertainment

name: Riddle Tower
description:
Will you manage to help Prince Monkid, dear friend?
Climb all levels to finish the game. In the levels you will find fun riddles, math puzzles and complex rebus. Just be patient because some are really hard.

Solve your daily riddle to climb to the top and if you stuck don't worry as if you use some hints you get riddles and answers to help you continue your journey.

name: Direction! Level Up!
description: Upgrade your skills by accurately pressing the arrow keys! Monsters are approaching your crystal, and it's up to your speed and reaction time to defend it. Of course, if you have a good sense of rhythm, you'll become even more powerful!

name: King of Snatchers
description: King of Snatchers is a story-driven multiplayer snatching game where players will try to complete an investigative quest by an AI. Through this gaming platform, the AI will be able to gather data regarding a catastrophe set to happen in the future. Players will compete to snatch important data.

name: Too Hot to Handle 3
description:
This time, you're the bombshell! Crash the retreat and start drama among paired-up singles in this season of "Too Hot to Handle," the beloved dating game based on the series. More customization! Fewer inhibitions! Will you find love and romance or go for casual hookups in this dating game?

Flirt with glittering singles, get tangled up in love triangles and make fateful decisions that could have lasting consequences for your dating life. Can you abstain from getting frisky and build a true romance? Or will you succumb to infatuation? The story is in your hands. Based on the hit Netflix reality series "Too Hot to Handle."

name: Nexus Rumble: The Ultimate Showdown
description: Welcome to Nexus Rumble, the ultimate showdown where champions clash in a fierce competition for survival! Prepare to embark on an adrenaline-fueled journey through diverse landscapes and exhilarating challenges in this heart-pounding multiplayer extravaganza.

name: Werewolf: The Apocalypse - Purgatory
description: A choice-driven RPG thriller set in the World of Darkness universe. Step into the shoes of Samira, a young werewolf refugee in Poland, as she battles dark forces and loneliness, caught between rage and despair. How will your story unfold?

name: Punch Club 2: Iron Fist
description: Build the robot champion and unravel the secrets of a mysterious AI in the new DLC for Punch Club 2: Fast Forward!

name: The Soul Ring of Soro: Divine Realm
description: A very stress relieving game. Possessing various benefits such as possession, transformation, leather items, and fantasy skills. Let you enjoy a different kind of happiness RPG. Many internet memes. Keep up with current events while making you happy.

name: Playback Loop
description: Carefully capture tracks of your actions, then play them back to solve puzzles with the aid of your recorded ghosts. Immerse yourself in an intriguing first-person puzzle platformer game set within an enigmatic virtual facility, where strategically thinking several steps ahead is the key to success.

name: RGB Rush 2
description: Can you adjust these raw images for a client? Advance your dream of becoming a colour grading professional. Beat the clock, impress your crush again! Practice today! The long awaited sequel.

name: S.X.E. Slider
description: A space-themed sliding tile puzzle game featuring 25 gorgeous images with a sci-fi theme.

name: Island Party Chaos
description: Island Party Chaos: Dive into a hilarious multiplayer adventure! Navigate whimsical obstacles, conquer wild challenges, and outsmart rivals in the race to be the ultimate party champion. Get ready for laughter, strategy, and unpredictable mayhem – let the chaos begin!

name: OutlawZ: Headhunter
description: Just remember, if you mess up big time, you could lose everything, even your life. So, for safety's sake, always make sure to keep your valuables in the safe zone.

name: Posthaste!
description: Postbound! is an arcade-style sorting game following your journey as a novice postal worker. In this casual, light-hearted, and family-friendly game filled with humor, you must correctly sort mail into the appropriate boxes before time runs out, while dealing with the Postmaster and Post Inspector!

name: Only High
description: A 3D platformer where you explore the dark cyberpunk world. You have to get way up from the underground facility to the spaceship. Discover secrets, play with friends, drive cars, and many more in Only High.

name: Small Living World
description: An ecosystem simulation running in your hands. Transform a desertic world into a lush forest. No stress, play at your own pace. This world is at your disposal. Terraform the landscape, add plants and animals. Create your perfect ecosystem.

name: Sovereign Elect
description: To become the new king, a contestant must secure the favor of at least four of the seven influential guilds in the kingdom. The contest is open to individuals of any background, fostering a diverse array of contestants vying for the throne.

name: SurvivalScape
description: Venture into SurvivalScape, an exhilarating auto shooter bullet hell! Choose your hero from a roster of exciting characters, each with their own special abilities and playstyles. Battle through waves of enemies, collect crystals to level up your hero, and confront unique bosses. Can you survive?

name: Moon Tower: Gotta Save the Universe Real Quick
description: Climb the Moon Tower in a thrilling precision platformer where every jump is critical. Master the distinct challenges of each level on your solitary ascent. Beware: one misstep can mean significant setbacks. Tackle the climb solo or engage your Twitch chat for a unique, interactive experience.

name: LOCKDOWN Protocol
description: A first-person social deduction game, combining real-time action and communication, 3 to 8 players. While most players will do their best to complete objectives and ensure victory, a small portion of dissidents will try to stop them at all costs, without getting caught.

name: Silent Sonata
description:
Dive into a chilling symphony of horror & harmony. Solve ancient mysteries, wield enchanted instruments, and face nightmarish foes. Will you compose your escape, or succumb to the melodies?
Streamer Mode: Allows your live stream chat to wield the power to control jumpscares, atmosphere + more

name: They Came From Venus
description: You are alone at your uncles remote mountain estate, when a mysterious package gets delivered to his doorstep. Soon after, things get out of hand and the house becomes your last bastion of survival.

name: Artisan TD
description: Artisan TD is a Maze-style Tower Defense where you survive by building mazes on over 40 unique maps.

name: Snaketris: Rescue 'em all
description: Oh no! Someone is capturing all the birds around the world. It's time for you to rescue them! Snaketris is a puzzle mashup of two classics where your main goal is to liberate all the trapped birds. Unlock cages, collect keys, use bombs and items in your way to become an animal hero!

name: Firepower Forge
description: Firepower Forge is a fast-paced multiplayer FPS with custom classes, interactive maps, and lots of chaos.

name: InfestStation
description:
In this dystopian future world, players take on the role of OMICRONIX Corp Recovery technicians sent out to derelict space stations to resolve the interdimensional catastrophes caused by the Faster-Than-Light Crimson Engine drives.

Threatened by otherworldly malevolent forces, players must work together to survive the horrors stalking them as they seek to sever this interdimensional rift and disable the Crimson Drive Cores once and for all.

InfestStation is a multiplayer Sci-Fi horror game. Board danger-filled abandoned space craft, work together to complete objectives, and sever the dimensional gateways that have allowed horrifying threats to take over and infest these now derelict spaces.

name: Endless Desert TD
description: Endless Desert TD is a unique blend of tower defense and roguelike gameplay as you strategically defend against diverse waves of enemies. Adapt to survive a challenging world where every playthrough is a new experience.

name: Veritus
description: Unshroud secrets hidden deep within the dark chambers of the god of shadow, Veritus’ castle. Persevere through monsters and mysteries lurking in every corner. Prepare to leave camp and journey into the castle’s lonely halls by collecting resources and equipment to make it out alive.

name: Saikyo Robots
description: Saikyo Robots is a roguelike RTS, inspired by pikmin and vampire survivor. Explore during the day and command your robot army to gather resources, produce, repair and fight. At night, hordes of enemies will attack your base. Upgrade your army and base to survive and obliterate the enemy onslaught.

name: Cataclismo
description: The Cataclismo left us broken. Construct fortresses and defend against waves of Horrors in this mix of tower defense and real-time strategy. Lead an expedition beyond the gates of the last city, and reclaim mist-shrouded ruins as you rebuild humanity—stone by stone.

name: Darkblade Ascent
description: Darkblade Ascent is a fast paced First-Person Melee Roguelike RPG with randomly generated weapons and upgrades, unlockable new classes and persistent leveling. Hack and slash your way through atmospheric dark fantasy locations, unique monsters and bosses.

name: ExoCross
description: ExoCross is an offroad racing game introducing 4CPT vehicle physics (4-way contact patch traction technology). A soft-body tire model allows for competitive time attack and multiplayer wheel to wheel racing.

name: Last Whisper
description: The only way to play the Last Whisper game is to survive. The more you explore the open world, the more you will need to acquire better gear as everything in the game wants you dead

name: Havoc
description:
Experience intense, team-based action in Havoc, a tactical FPS that takes the genre to new heights with semi-destructible environments. Use strategy and skill to plant and defuse bombs, destroy walls to reach your target, and more. Immerse yourself in team-based action across various game modes, including bomb defusal, team deathmatch, and more.

Havoc introduces semi-destructible environments, adding a whole new layer of strategy to the gameplay. Destroy walls and obstacles to create new paths, catch opponents off guard, and create distractions. Every match is filled with unexpected twists and turns, keeping you on your toes and demanding quick thinking and skill.

With multiple game modes at your disposal, you can choose the experience that suits your preferences. Engage in high-stakes bomb defusal matches, where teamwork and strategy are essential. Or jump into team deathmatch mode and engage in epic battles against 5 other players. The choice is yours.

Havoc allows you to customize your lobby settings, giving you control over gravity, movement, and more. Tailor the game to your liking, whether you prefer fast-paced, gravity-defying combat or a more grounded and realistic approach.

Prepare to defend bomb sites, plan your strategies, and customize your loadout to emerge as the winning team. Havoc offers an immersive and customizable experience that will keep you hooked. Gear up, dive into the action, and embrace the chaos of Havoc now!

name: The Operator
description: As an Operator, you will assist FDI's field agents by analyzing evidence on your computer and making deductions. Help them solve impossible cases in this immersive interface game, full of plot twists and mysteries. Everything will be explained, you just have to ████ ██ ██████.

name: Vorax
description:
Vorax is an Open World Survival Horror game set on a Mediterranean island where a mysterious pathogen has infected the local population. An army battalion is sent to quarantine the population but 48 hours later, all communication with the battalion is lost.

Do you have what it takes to survive?

name: Carter Story
description: Carter's Story is a RogueLike game with random elements combined with action adventures, where you try to randomly pick up equipment and fight enemies, and eventually get the trial of growth.

name: Critter Crops
description: Sylvie is a young witch, banished from home for her magic. A mysterious letter brings her to Mur Mur Town, an abandoned, spooky place where a bountiful life awaits her! Grow magical crops, unlock the mysteries of Mutter Island, and build a new home for an aspiring witch and her friends!

name: Tormentis
description:
Prepare your dungeon against intruders and protect your loot chests with monsters and well-placed traps. Train your hero, equip powerful gear and conquer other players' dungeons to fight your way to the top of the league.

Where classic action role-playing meets dungeon building. Your task is to protect your loot boxes from intruders. They supply you with coins and your opponents want to empty them!

Create a unique dungeon that will mislead your opponents. Place monsters and traps in your dungeon and lead your opponents into an ambush. They may not reach your treasury in time!

With every victory over another player you will receive trophies and rise in the rankings.

name: Drag
description: Drag is a time attack offroad racing game with physical suspension simulation and a tire model that allows for competitive racing. It can be played with gamepad or keyboard and supports racing wheels including force feedback.

name: Super Mario Bros. RMX
description: Sin descripción

name: TNTPhobia
description: An oniric walking-simulator ﻿tribute to TNT: Evilution ﻿﻿

name: Kajun's Lucid Room
description: A little collection of mini-games with Kajun-chan. You get an up-close and personal look at Kajun-chan's daily routine in this unique sandbox module from changing clothes, photo shooting with custom posing & dancing and even help Kajun-chan shower !

name: Find Me
description: This is a 2D flatformer game where you go on an adventure to regain your body, and you arrive at your destination through various sections. Lots of prepared obstacles, traps, and tricks. I hope you reach your destination with all your detailed manipulation, memory, persistence, and luck.

name: Ninja Kato 4
description: 2D Action Game! Robot Ninja Kato's training has entered the final stages! Control the robot ninja Kato and train him to become a full-fledged ninja.

name: Weekdays
description: Black-and-White Style: Immerse yourself in a unique atmosphere where light and shadow play a crucial role.Variety of Locations: Explore strange corridors with rooms, a forest with a witch's hut, an old cemetery, an abandoned house on a wasteland, and more.

name: Dog
description: The ultimate idle clicker game! Tap to collect adorable pups, upgrade your canine companions, and build a thriving dog park empire. Earn tradable Steam items every 60 minutes of play. Join thousands in this free, paw-some adventure. Start your doggy journey now!

name: The Human Snake
description: The Human Centipede meets The nokia classic snake in this 1980s retro inspired game entitled THE HUMAN SNAKE!!!

name: Flappy Horse
description: This is a game where you guide this crazy looking horse through hurdles to try and gain the best score you can! As you Flap through the game you collect sugar cubes which you use in the shop to buy upgrades to get even better scores an even more sugar cubes.

name: Carpe Noctem
description: A yuri visual novel about a vampiress and a monster hunter falling in love in Victorian England.

name: Field of the Dead
description: Field of the Dead is a post-apocalyptic sci-fi horror game where you battle undead and mutants with space weapons. Level up, fight bosses, acquire rare gear, and explore infested areas to uncover the apocalypse's secrets. Supports single-player and up to four-player multiplayer.

name: Bonk Jam!
description:
Ranger has gotten a hold of a new melee weapon: the Bonk Hammer!
The Hammer allows the player to jump higher, move faster, and fight harder!
This mod (built on Copper) also includes two additional monsters: our good friend the gaunt from Quoth (with reworked code), and Dwell's brute! Across the set of maps, you will encounter Bonk runes, which can be used to purchase awesome skins for the new hammer in the start map.

name: 3D Puzzle: Sun Temple
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful place.

name: 3D Puzzle: Abandoned Prison
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful place.

name: Cazzarion: Shooting Gallery
description: Sin descripción

name: Racing Car Chaos: Extreme Stunt Showdown
description: Embrace the Chaos and Conquer the Stunts!

name: Farmageddon: Undead
description: Farmageddon Undead is Tower Defense, Strategy game based on post-apocalyptic Story. Step into the role of a farmer who must save the world! Lead the world leaderboards! This game won't give you anything for free. Prepare yourself, you might suffer.

name: ASCII Tower Defense
description: Wave after wave of enemy shapes are looking to break through your defenses and ravage the land of Language. Build your defenses, all made of ASCII characters, to repel the invaders!

name: Singularity Survivors
description: Singularity Survivors throws you into the heart of a post-apocalyptic realm where the very essence of survival is put to the test in a vast, open-world environment. A game that demands wit, will, and strategy, you’re not just fighting to live — you’re crafting a new world from the ashes of the old.

name: Death From The Darkness
description: "Death From The Darkness," a horror game where survival takes precedence in harsh conditions without conventional weaponry, facing a formidable adversary. There are no hints; you must be vigilant and use your wit to endure. Darkness conceals both danger and salvation.

name: The Cooking Class First Course
description: The Cooking Class - First Course, is a story driven short game whose main goal is to help the player to see the bigger picture behind the franchise.

name: Pathogen X
description: An atmospheric first-person survival horror game in which you take on the role of Special Agent Aiden Clark and embark on a deadly mission into an underground laboratory to destroy a biological threat and extract a pathogen sample.

name: T.I.M.E
description: T.I.M.E is a First-Person, Arena, Boomer Shooter that pits players against each other in a one-on-one contest. Players compete in a round-based first to 3 wins system that is balanced through time rewinding set by the round loser to balance the scales of skill against strategy.

name: Broken Lens
description: Broken Lens is a cosy game about spotting the differences between two scenes and thus discover the story of a little broken robot. Will you be able to uncover all the secrets?

name: Sky of Destruction
description: Sky of Destruction is a top-down shooter. Combine aircrafts in your combat fleet, which will help you during the mission. Your goal is to destroy the enemy aircraft carrier or buildings, breaking through the enemy air armada. Explosions and total destruction!

name: Berrywitched!
description: Berrywitched! is a lovely twisted game where you, our protagonist, are lost within a forest that is supposedly cursed. You pass out, only to be awoken by a cute girl claiming to be a Strawberry Witch.

name: Decathlon DX
description:
You do it for yourself, your country... and the gold.
All of the individual athletic disciplines are yours - speed, strenght, stamina and the desire to win. But they will all have to come together as one, because you're about to participate in the most prestigious video sporting event in history: Decathlon DX.

name: Days of Night: Episode 1
description:
You're freshly 18 and seeking experience in the work force. You struggle to find work until one day the opportunity of a life time would come your way.

Little to you're knowledge you would be stepping in a world of HORROR!

Experience the HORRORS of working night shift at you're local grocery store.

name: Layered
description: layered is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. The game stars Gatatsuki and Gakutsuki, who must collect Qualia, this game's version of effects.

name: Pan Beats
description: Cute simple rhythm game! All you have to do is press the falling notes in time with the rhythm! The game can be enjoyed by both sound game beginners and those who are familiar with sound games, with familiar songs and three different difficulty levels. Please try to play this game!

name: Worm Bounce: Worms Jump King
description: Embark on an epic journey with our fearless bouncy worms heroes as they bounce and escape the treacherous underground, navigating a maze of platforms to reach the surface! But beware, a toxic flood is relentlessly chasing them—can you guide the worms to safety?

name: The Curse of Elmwood
description: You hear quiet whispers from deep inside the house, but no one sees. You begin to feel that you are not alone in this house. Curse of Elmwood is an atmospheric horror where you find yourself trapped in a gloomy 18th century mansion, steeped in mystery and horror.

name: Flip It
description: Wrong side

name: Find The Thing
description: Sin descripción

name: Apple
description: How do you like them apples? Because we have them all! Have time in the game or click the apple to get your favorite apple.

name: Simulation: Catalyst
description: In this game you can enjoy a semi-causal 2d platformer while fully immersing yourself in a 3d parallax environment.

name: Laser Sounds
description: You are a mercenary hired by the Space Company to inspect the space station, which has not been heard from for years, because of the news you have received that some experiments are being carried out. Your goal is to clear everyone from this space station.

name: Dice Dice Dice
description: This is a casual deck-building game based on dice rolling. Players will rely on their choices and some luck to achieve victory.

name: Mushroom
description: Mushroom is a clicker game. You will see the visions after eating poisonous mushrooms. You will get a mushroom every x hours. Collect more to win the world.

name: Find Colibries
description: Test your attentiveness in the captivating world of Aztec jungles in the game Find Colibries and find all the hidden birds!

name: Gears Unchained: The Rise of Revolution
description: In a futuristic city under dictatorship, a brave mechanic with an illegal electronic arm rises up against the dictator. Face dangers, unravel intrigues and overcome deadly obstacles, approaching an epic final showdown.

name: Oh, honey! Anime clicker!
description: Welcome to Oh, Honey! Anime Clicker!, a simple clicker game set in a delightful anime-style! In this game, you'll tap to accumulate points.

name: Dorf the Dwarf
description: Dorf the dwarf is a puzzle game which replicates the classic game Zeek the Geek. You play as Dorf, a dwarf adventuer, who dares into the dungeons of Koganusân , ruins of a dwarf fortress, to loot treasures, while avoiding ghosts, elephants and deadly traps, and solving puzzles.

name: Mini-Market Simulator VR
description: Run your own mini-market, starting from a humble corner shop and growing into a bustling retail hub. Stock shelves, assist customers, and manage your store in an immersive VR environment.

name: OBJ VR
description: An educational VR game that takes players into realistic school emergency scenarios. The game includes various scenarios such as fires, earthquakes and chemical accidents that require quick and effective response.

name: Duck Run
description: Duck Run is an exhilarating 2D precision platformer that will test your reflexes and agility.

name: Just Pizza
description: Welcome to Just Pizza, a game that turns your love for pizza into an exciting and rewarding experience! This game is all about clicking on a pizza to earn more pizzas. The more you click, the more pizzas you get. It’s as simple and fun as that!

name: SNK vs. Capcom: SVC Chaos
description:
SNK and CAPCOM legends clash in this star-studded crossover fighting game!
The 2003 arcade hit SVC CHAOS is back and better than ever!

SVC CHAOS—a dream match of epic proportions! Worlds collide as 36 iconic characters across various series from SNK (mainly THE KING OF FIGHTERS) and CAPCOM (mainly STREET FIGHTER) do battle in a frantic fight to the finish! Brand-new rollback netcode and tournament modes allow for fun, fast-paced online matches—all while still retaining the classic visuals and controls of the original fan favorite. Also comes with a hitbox viewer and a gallery mode! Rise up and throw down with players all around the world in this new evolution of the SVC CHAOS legacy!

name: Urban Flow Vehicle Vault
description: Sin descripción

name: Hole io: Ancient DLC
description: Sin descripción
